item.title: About
item.description: Startwords is a research periodical irregularly published by the Center for Digital Humanities at Princeton. More formal than a blog yet more speculative and process-based than a peer-reviewed journal, Startwords is a forum for experimental humanities scholarship. Embedded code, data physicalizations, and emerging forms of project documentation are explored through writing that is creative, conversational, personal, essayistic, exploratory, data-driven, and academically rigorous. Each issue will feature two articles that are unified by a common theme, feature, or concern.
